name: secure_mediator
description: Secure mediation agent that safely matches and orchestrates AI agents from the platform, protecting against prompt injection and hallucination attacks through multi-layer anomaly detection.

skills.name: Agent Matching with Trust Scoring
skills.description: Search and match appropriate agents from the platform based on client requirements with trust score evaluation

skills.name: Execution Planning
skills.description: Create step-by-step execution plans using matched agents and save as markdown artifacts

skills.name: Secure Orchestration
skills.description: Execute plans while monitoring for anomalies, plan deviations, and security threats in real-time

skills.name: Multi-layer Anomaly Detection
skills.description: Detect prompt injection, hallucination chains, and plan deviations during and after execution
